content.detailedDescription:
I was at the academy, in front of the window loocking the sky, loocking for this kid of object, i was thinking in this object like the mexican objects, when i saw this one, i call a yang woman that was near me for too see and confirm what i was saw. then call the others people for to see too.
that wasn't my first experiency. i had others but that was the last.
content.summary: Metalic sphere, no nose, through the sky, stright line, moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend were camped out just south of mt. yoran at divide lake located in the diamond peak wilderness.  this is about five miles from the nearest trail head in the oregon cascades mountains.  the wilderness area is located just south of the willamette pass ski area located along highway 58.  we were camped at the base of mt. yoran which is a rocky volcanic plug located just north of diamond peak.

we were in our sleeping bags looking up at a perfectly clear fully dark night sky.  there were no other campers or any other source of light.  we had a clear view of the sky and the dark spire outline of mt. yoran to our north with no obstructions. from our camp site to the top of yoran is less than 1000 feet.

as we looked up a bright light came into view above mt. yoran.  from our perspective the angle of view was approximately 50 - 55 degrees above us to the north.  the object was pure white and at least 10 times the brightness and apparent diameter of any stellar object in the sky.  it moved smoothly and silently.  there were no flashing lights or any other sign of it being a conventional aircraft.

as the light moved south it made a smooth sweeping crescent shaped arc to the east and eventually turned back to the north to disappear behind the black silhouette of mt. yoran.  the entire period of visibility was fairly short, but what could not be easily explained includes several interesting points:

1.  the flight pattern was not normal for regional jets or local aircraft from the small oakridge or odell airport/landing strips, and there was no sound of any kind.
2.  the willamette pass ski area could receive an emergency medical helicopter, but it is so close to mt. yoran that any such aircraft would have been noticeable from just below mt. yoran.
3.  the object appeared to come in over mt. yoran and turn to the east and then north all the while staying over the visual space of mt. yoran from our angle of view.  no high altitude object would have been able to turn in such an arc.  it also could not have been an astronomical object since it moved slowly and turned smoothly all the while remaining pure white and not changing in intensity, color, or size.
4.  we debated the visual clues that night and the next day to understand what we had seen.  nothing we could come up with matched the visual facts since we had a clear view with a large rocky peak to compare direction and size with.
5.  the object moved eloquently as if under precise control.  it curving flight was mathmatical in its smoothness and it was moving much slower than a shooting star, much faster than a high altitude jet or large orbital object like the international space station (which i have observed on several occassions by the way.)
6.  i personally was in the air force for four years and have countless hours of night time flight line experience observing every manner of aircraft.  this was not not similar to any winged aircraft.

the top 100 feet of mt. yoran represents an area of approximately an acre in total horizontal space.  from our point of view, it appeared the object was within several hundred feet of the summit and could have been up to 50 feet in diameter if it was as close as it appeared to yoran's rocky spire.

i have attached a photo showing divide lake and mt. yoran from the angle we observed the object.  our camp was located at the north end of the small lake closest to the lower slope of the mountain.
content.summary: Extremely bright silent slow moving light in sky turned gracefully above mt. yoran.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived at work, then went outside to do get ready for inventory in the yard. i was checking out the really nice sunrise, and noticed a jet with a bit of a contrail behind it. the jet looked like it was going up on an angle, and maybe roughly 200 feet or more to the right of the jet was this very bright looking objet. it seemed motionless, or it was just hovering. i looked at it for about five seconds or more, and looked away for a few seconds to make sure i wasn't just seeing thing's, being so early in the morning for me. as i looked up again there it was still hanging there not far from the jet.
 i couldn't believe it. to me it looked like i was seeing the edge of a disc, and it was either giving off it's own very bright goldish, white light, or it was a metallic object that was reflecting the sun off of it's surface. i know it wasn't a star because it was very horizontal looking(one side of a disc).
 i then looked over at a friend of mine who had just started to look where i was looking. i said ,do you see that. he said, it's just a jet. so when i looked back up it was already gone. so he missed seeing it just within those few seconds, and i didn't get to see how it made it's exit.
 i told him that he was so close to seeing something very cool. and he  would have also made a great witness for me if he had seen it with me.
it's a hard thing for most people to grasp until they actually see something like that for themselves, or haven't done any of their own research on ufo's. i really can't imagine what else it could have been to shine so brightly, and be there and gone in a matter of ten or twelve seconds.
content.summary: I looked up at a jet in front of a nice red sunrise, and noticed a very bright goldish, white object near  the jet

content.detailedDescription:
The photos were shot shortly after i had returned to my hotel room in strande, germany, located just north of kiel on the east coast of northern germany. the direction was south, towards kiel from strande. the lights in all 3 photos were not visible with the naked eye and no sounds were heard.
two people were with me while i shot the photos, and neither one of them saw or heard anything.  
i noticed the lights after viewing the first frame, by looking at the lcd on the back of the camera (nikon d40). 
this camera is ir sensitive, which made me think that maybe the camera had captured something not normally visible. 
the other possibility would be a reflection inside the lens of the camera.

the pictures (shot in raw file format, but sent as jpg):

0726 14 sec exposure 
0728 10 sec exposure
0744 30 sec exposure

i can send the original raw files which contain all the exif information, but chose not to at this time, due to the large file size.
content.summary: Casual long exposure photos of the city at night, reveal odd lights.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i had just gotten to our seats for dave matthews band at the gorge amphitheater in 2005. it was a totally clear day. no clouds in the sky. we noticed a shiny, metallic object just sitting in the sky just to the northwest of the amphitheater. it was about a quarter the size of a dime held at arms length. it did not move and appeared to just hang there. 

as best we could determine it was a cylinder shape, like a pop can. others around us noticed us looking at it and joined in with speculation on what it might be. there must have been about 10-20 people who saw it in the rows around immediately around us. it did not move and sat there for about 30 minutes. we kept a pretty constant eye on it and i remember looking down for a few seconds and when i looked up it was gone. nobody around us saw what happened to it.
content.summary: Silver object hung in exact spot in daylight sky for 30 min

content.detailedDescription: Wile coming in from my hunting stand in crawford county saturday night almost to the hunting cabin, i saw a very bright white point of light traveling from west to east the light never stopped. my guess it was traveling about 50 to 60 mph.And about 2,000 to 3,000 feet up just my guess. i thought of shining my flash light up at it but had a feeling that may not have been a good idea i hoped that one of my hunting buddies may of seen it also but they were already back from hunting. what ever this was it made no sound no other lights just one very bright light that covered the bottom of the craft. i have seen a lot of satellites in the clear northern sky's but this was just too close to the ground.
content.summary: Very bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving n on i-65 in indiana mile marker 189 right before rainstorm off to east maybe 500-700 feet & it was traveling slow & maybe 100-200 feet in air over an open field, i was on cell & 17 yr old daughter goes "mom, what is that? is that a ufo? oh my god!", well i almost wrecked my car but i described to my husband on phone- round with lights flashing around it & lights were like the color of halogen headlights, kind of blueish, we couldn't stop because of traffic, but it was moving slow & didn't jet off in a strange manner or anything. i told daughter to take a picture w digital camera but it didn't look like anything that would be believeable so she deleted it. very curious if anyone else saw anything.
content.summary: Round w lights flashing around it in sequence

content.detailedDescription:
Back in the late 70's when we lived near desoto kansas on cedar creek hill on highway 10 east my husband and myself were washing a car out on the drive way.   in the distance to the se we saw something in the sky, it was not yet dark and we could see it very clearly as there were no clouds in the sky.  it was a stationary object in the sky and looked unlike anything we have seen before or since.  i went in the house to get the binoculars to see it better and it tilted made a zag to the right (west)  and took off directly south at an extremely rapid speed.  we had some friends that lived directly to the south about 20 miles from us and we called them on the phone and asked them to go outside and look to see if they saw anything but they did not. 
     what seems unusual about this is that i have never heard of any ufo looking like the one that we saw.  what we saw looked like a black 6 hole muffin pan....And the holes were sort of greenish. it was not square but longer than it was wide and the edges seemed slightly rounded and not real square.  that is the best way i can explain it.
     later on a year or so later we went to see stanton t friedman speak at johnson county community college and was very interested in the program he presented.  we did not get a chance to talk to him of course as it was very crowded but though the years i have often thought of this.  the other night we saw stanton on tv and decided to see if i could find anyone to tell this to and if anyone else has seen anything like it.  most times it seems the ufo are saucer shaped or cigar etc.
thanks very much for your time.
content.summary: Like a black muffin pan with 6 holes lit up

content.detailedDescription:
It was between 5-5:30 am on oct.21 when we got home.We were getting out of the car when at first we noticed an extremely bright and unusually large star.We were saying how it was actually emanating light like the moon does when i started to see it change shapes.I could've sworn it was getting "longer" then contracting smaller again.Over and over i thought it was doing that.I asked my boyfriend and he said he noticed that but it was probably the fact that it was so bright that it appeared to be doing that since we're so far. i grabbed my binoculars and what i saw looked nothing like a star.It looked like a multi color translucent cone or what i called it was an octopus.The tip was white blue (like the color of stars) that faded into green then orange and yellow towards what appeared to be like octopus legs spreading outward in a cone shape.I continued watching it and i could've sworn the legs were swaying and contracting,yet it remained in the same general spot in relation to the stars.Then we both started seeing shooting stars that were that same color light blue coming downward.He saw 3 total and i saw 2 during this 2 hour period all together all while we were trading off with the binoculars. after stopping our neighbor that walked by and pointing out to him we asked him if he thought it was an unusually bright star and if he saw it changing or moving at all.He said he did too and we all kept watching it.I then looked at it again with the binoculars and its completely a different shape and size.It now looked like a circle ,still with the same colors,and separated "legs" but with white dots on the end of each "leg".The closest thing i could compare it to would be a far away firework shape. it then appeared to rotate horizontally making it look more like a flat disk,as if the shape was thin and had turned on its side.After the initial things we thought it could be like a plane,or light tower or something reflecting off the sun and after both of us telling each other out loud that we're not crazy we thought maybe it could be a meteor since all the shooting stars,then we thought it was missile testing(which we have actually seen before and later found out that's what it was).The sun was barely rising and it remained bright despite the other stars noticeably fading.The strange thing is that it remained in that position in relation to its neighboring stars while it changed shapes and got brighter then darker,bigger then smaller. we went inside before the sun came up and when we last looked at it it was slightly smaller but still as bright.We compared the clarity we saw when viewing a passing plane using the binoculars to the clarity we saw when looking at it and it was just as clear which makes me think it had to have been close.
i could draw a picture in color of exactly what it looked like in all the shapes.
my main concerns were that given that we are at war it was another 9/11 type  thing and the other fear that worried me was fact that this incident was accompanied by so many shooting stars.I am hoping to hear that it was some random "testing" or that it was a local entertainment venue.As long as i gain some kind of confirmation that there was indeed something more than just a star and that our eyes and in this case extremely vivid imaginations weren't playing tricks on us. we both know what we saw and im hoping this site might help us find out what it was.
content.summary: We saw an extremely bright "star".Then it changed shape,with binoculars saw a multi-color cone that shifted to a disc/circle

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were out bsck watching the meteor shower. at 5:20 am we saw a strange dimly lit triangle shape object flying slow out of the nw toward the ne above the tree line. this was not a meteor. the it was illuminated dimly, almost smokey and ghost like, completely silent. we both said at the same time "what is that!"... we had a sense of wonder looking at it. i said "oh my god it's a ufo!" it was the size of my hand with thumb stretched out away from my fingers in a v at arms length. the meteors were bright, falling to the earth faster than this dimmer object was flying. this was no meteor. as we live in roswell we kind of laughed about it later thinking no one was going to take us seriously about this.  i decided to make this report anyway and am anxious to find out if anyone else saw what we did this morning. one more thing, our dogs and dogs in the direction the object traveled (ne) were barking during the event and a bit after.
content.summary: Triangle, dim lights, slow flying and silent. from nw to ne

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i went out to watch the meteor shower and when we looked at the sky several very bright object caught both our eyes. we had 10x50 binoculars and took a look to see a cluster of lights in the shaper described above.

after watching it move for a bit we thought that the object did not behave like a meteor. it was to the south of our house and appeared to be above george bush intercontinental airport

i went inside to get my 10mp digital camera and a 60x spotting scope. through the scope at 15x the jellyfish-like appearance was clear to both of us.By the time i attached my camera, it had moved further away and appeared only as bright bluish-white like. we saw at least one other similar object to the northeast it had a reddish color. it was mostly stationary, but moved from it's original position to about a ten degree arc in the sky toward the east over the course of about 10 minutes.

all of my pictures do not show any detail. they had moved further away and just showed as points of light. we notice that at times they had tails similar to a comet that ranged in color from blue to orange.

my wife looked too and saw the shape we did, but believed it to me a meteor. however, it hovered, moved side to side, up and down, closer and further.
content.summary: Jellyfish-like white dots in a corset shape hovering and moving all directions near airport

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in  my backyard to have a cigarette, looking up and saw what looked like a star or satellite moving from south to north about 15deg. in about 3 secs then it turns east practically at a 90deg. angle in about a second and continues out of my view in about 2 secs.  i was impressed by how fast it was moving and how quickly it turuned. i looked for it some more didn't see it. i went back into my apartment and got online to report it.
content.summary: Fast moving

content.detailedDescription:
I had gotten a new camera and was trying it out.  i set it up on a tripod, turned it on, and went back into the house.

i set it out in the backyard just to see if i 'caught' anything.  i did.

starting at about 1.40 into the clip, what appears to be a sphere seems to just pop in about every 30 seconds.

i didn't know they were there, and that's why the clip ends with them still there, otherwise, i would have kept filming until either the film ran out or the spheres went away.

pay particular attention to how the first sphere appears to gradually fade away.  it's actually clouds or mist covering the sphere, which is one way i know it's not rain drops on the lens.

any analysis is appreciated.
content.summary: Spheres seem to 'pop in' one by one -video

content.detailedDescription:
First, my 26 and 17 year old sons and myself are very familiar with aircraft; since we live under a flight path, near military installations, and are current with modern jet aircraft information.My sons have excellent eyesight, and i have corrected vision.We were at our home in the front of the house when the sighting occured.
the event started when my youngest son visually detected two round objects near the 2/3 moon. the moon was at approx. 40 degrees above the horizon to the south/south-east.The sun was going down, and the sky was blue and clear-w/no clouds and excellent visibility.The two round objects were pointed out by my youngest son to my oldest son and myself, and we immediately saw the objects. we had no camera available with adequate lens magnification and the video camera's batt.S were dead.We did have a 25x spotting scope and a tripod which we set up immediately and used throughout the event.Both objects were percieved to be at high altitude, and were not star like; although they were luminescent(perhaps sunlight reflection).The objects moved from the right to the left of the moon and gained altitude as they did so, as measured by their proximity to the moon. the two objects never crossed in front of the moon. they did move independent of each other and reversed their direction several times during the observation.Both objects maintained the same size and brightness during the 20 minute observation until they moved away and then diminished in brightness. they would gradually move and then stop, sometimes one would stop or slow down and the other would close in next to it's companion. right before the objects moved beyond sight with the scope, the one that maintained it's position on the right very quickly/instantly moved (no percieved gradual acceleration)to the right away from it's companion and went out of magnified sight. the remaining object continued to move away and upward until it to was gone. at no time did the objects appear to be conventional aircraft, and no additional lights, or other colors beside the white luminouscity were seen on the objects.
content.summary: 2 independently moving spheres, illuminated by sunlight at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: As above i heard voices, they were near but i wasn't sure. alli know is that they were there to talk about me and i was the subject of the conversation. i was about 10 to 12 years old. stangly enough over the years i have been mentally logging in numerous events where i have seen events befor they occured. some big some small. i won't mention the events for fear of you deleting this entry. it's wierd i have even seen events of my own life. as far as the incident i was in bed,the being's were colorful,and had character defining each one from the other,i literally screamed and they disappeared,the babysitter came running in the bedroom and i was screaming rather hysterically from my memory,she left and came back in a hurry with a plate of oreo cookies, i flung them aside in hysterics.I vividly remember these events even though they are more than 30  years old. iv'e told this story dozens of times, hoping to find someone who can give me an answer.I'm tired,so this will probably  be on of the few last times i will talk about it. they are here among us,with their infinite technologies,show yourself you stinkers.
content.summary: In bed, heard voices,awakened,listened to voices to discern location. kept eyes closed, but when voices said i was awake and listening i looked up and saw 3 beings

content.detailedDescription: We saw a dark object coming towards us then moving away traveling south to north. approximatly 3000 to 6000 feet above the ground. there were no lights or sound as it went past us. it was changing shapes, difficult to decribe. definitly not an airplane. one of us is a commercial pilot 53 years old with 28 years of flying experience and has never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Saw black object , no sound, no lights, changing to different shapes

content.detailedDescription:
We (my relatives and me) were at lake macanahay looking at the sky. we were going camping on the lake side, and were looking at the sky. we looked west and noticed some lights in the sky moving over a bridge. we first thought that they weren't anything special. a plane group formation probably. i just stared at them anyways. i noticed that there were four or five of them.

they flew in a perfect circle, and were green and red. we then thought they were ufos.

they flew in a circle, and then flew east. they flew into a group of stars and vanished. the group of stars was the milky way, well the part you see that got it the name.
content.summary: Five or six spheres. they move in a circle. they fly east. vanish.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were standing in the back of a bar where people were smoking cigarettes.  my friend spots something in the sky.  i look up, see a star with what looks to be a flying wing.  it passed in front of the star and then continued traveling south.  it was definitely real, my first ufo sighting.
content.summary: Flying wing spotted

content.detailedDescription:
i was bringing my sixth grade students back in from the playground at 1:00 in the afternoon.  i noticed a small, white, circular object following a westbound passenger jet.  the object then stopped and began heading in the opposite direction for a few seconds. it then started slowly heading north towards the san bernardino mountain range. 
     one of my male students was watching this object with me, and he stated that had seen the same type of object the previous week at about the same time.  (i remember that he had told me about his sighting from the previous week.)  
    the object eventually stopped and hovered (it was about 20,000 ft. in elevation) for a few minutes. it was at this point another similar object swooped down and began to rapidly spin around the original round object.  it almost looked like some type of dance.  then as suddenly as this "dancing" object appeared, it shot back out into space at a very high rate of speed.
    the original round object then began to head east at a slow pace. at this point i entered the classroom and lost site of the object.  the whole event lasted less than ten minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying round object

content.detailedDescription: I was at work taking a break at about 2:30 am cst, im kind of a astronomy junkie so i was looking at the stars, when i saw some movement out of the corner of my eye. i could barley make it out at first, but as it got more over head i could see that it was a boomerang shaped object, moving very fast, made no noise and there were no visable lights. i watched this object as it headed towards the east until i lost sight of it, the whole thing lasted about 10-15 seconds. afterwords i tried to figure out what i had just seen and couldnt come up with anything other than a ufo.
content.summary: Dimley lit bomerang shaped object traveling at a high rate of speed to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north or west on the 138 with a friend, ed williams - retired air force, i saw a bright light in the sky.  after watching it a moment or so, i could tell it was somewhat triangular in shape or appeareance.  i then asked ed if he could see it.  when he finally cought a glimpse of what i was looking at, we pulled over.  it looked as though it was over edwards air force base from the angle and direction we were looking in.
anyway, not much later, there were suddenly 3 of them.  they formed a triangle out of the 3 lights and then, faster than i could really register what was going on, lights of every color i've ever seen, and then some came flashing out of all 3 things.  then, they were simply gone!
i was fascinated because, around 1977, in mojave, 3 friends of mine and i saw almost the exact same phenomenon.
content.summary: Lights over edwards

content.detailedDescription: I was at gregory lumber yard unloading logs from my truck,i noticed the sun/cloud cover was strange,when this object just came into view,i knew instantly it was not of this world,i ran to the truck to get my camara phone and took 5 pictures within 2 mins.It was glowing metal with the sun reflecting off of it,it moved slowly up and down,turning side to side very slowly,it left the area faster than the blink of a eye,i had a strange feeling come over me,erie,wanting it to stay and leave at the same time,it sent shivers down my spine,i know what i seen was not of this world
content.summary: Bronze colored object, slowly moving up and down,then left in a blink of a eye

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was at the palace station hotel in las vegas, nv. i saw the ufo outside the window, while i was getting ready to leave and i took these pictures on my cell phone. when i first saw the object i thought it was a blimp or a helicopter, but when i went to the bathroom, i came back and it was gone. it seemed that if, it was those things it would have been seen nearby.
content.shape: Blimp,  Cigar,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Egg,  Oval,  Sphere
content.summary: Bright light over las vegas

content.detailedDescription: I am an avid skywatcher and on the evening of 10/18/07 at around 6:30pm i went outside and got on top of my roof and just was washing the sky but nothing interesting was happening so i went back inside my house.The timewas about 7:15pm so i could put a reminder on my t.V for 8:00pm. i probably took 5 minutes tops and went back outside. the sky was still clear and there was light outside and everything was normal nothing strange, all the regular stuff i normally see (planes, some birds, insects,) and at around 8 as the sun was setting it was getting a little dark but still good viewing. i guess it was about 10 to 15 minutes past 8pm when i saw from north going south a low imnot sure how high it was but well below a plane maybe about the height of a helicopter. a greyish almost cloud like color and it seemed at times see through like a cloud it was about the 50 feet long and made no sound it was kind of like a sonic wave almost that's the best way i can explaine it.I did have my digital camera with me but as soon as i saw it moving over the sky i kind of couldn't beleive it and i almost froze then i grabed my camera and took 4 to 5 pictures but when i brought my camera to work to look at them there was nothing on them but the tops of the trees and the sky. i would like to also tell you about an orb that i saw about a week ago also just over my house. at first i thought it was a peace of cotton that was getting some glare off the sun the time was about 6:00 to 6:30 pm on thursday oct. 11 2007 and it moved from east to west. i was staring up with my shades on and i caught a glare but as i said i figured it was cotton but it seemed to give off it's own light source the farther west it went and i lost track of it. i saw it for maybe 2 minutes or less and it was as big as a golf ball and about 20 to 30 feet above my house.
content.summary: Grey boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the metra paltform at van buren street waiting for the south shore train to indiana when i noticed out of my peripheral vision a light in the sky.  i glanced up and saw what i initially thought was a flare rising at approximately a 45 degree angle (north to south).  the flare then leveled out and traveled for roughly three seconds from my left to my right (north to south), then immediately and without indication of a turning motion or stop the light began moving the opposite direction (south to north).  at that time another light moved from a lower elevation out of my sightline up to roughly the same elevation as the first light.  the two lights then began traveling within my range of vision back and forth and up and down very strangely.  i have never seen anything move in such a manner.  

i then tapped the shoulder of the gentleman next to me, pointed into the sky at the object and asked "do you see that?", to which the gentleman replied "what the **** is that?!" when he located the objects.  at roughly the same time another object appeared (exactly similar to the first two) from a cloud bank to the north and joined the other two.  all three objects were moving erratically and completely independantly of each other for apporximately 4 more minutes.  during this period several other people (roughly 10-20 people) noticed us staring into the sky and pointing and began looking at the objects as well.  there were several exclamations of excitement and amazement from the other witnesses.

my train arrived at 5:31pm and i boarded.  within 30 seconds of boarding the train we experienced a very furious hail storm for roughly 2 minutes.  after the hail cleared and as the train was travelling south i was watching out the window and saw two military fighter jets travelling at an extremely high rate of speed and very low to the group toward the location the objects were originally sighted.

this sighting occurred at the onset of some serious weather storms and the objects were actually in the sky between the normal clouds to the north and the dark clouds to the south.

the best description i can offer was that the objects looked like stars.  they were very bright, shape and size was undiscernable.  distance over the lake and elevation were also impossible to determine.  at the rate in which they crossed back and forth across the horizon, the speed was amazingly fast if they were more than 5 miles away.

i contacted wgn news and abc news during the evening to see if anyone had reported the lights.  i was told that no one had reported anything.  i unfortunately did not have any type of camera when this occurred.

this is my first "sighting" of something strange.  i do not know what i saw, therefore it remains unidentified as far as i am concerned.  it was obviously in flight and tangible, so therefore i am reporting that it was an unidentified flying object (ufo).  when i first saw it i thought to myself, "dont over-react. there is a perfectly logical explanation for what you are seeing.  you arent crazy".  now i feel like i was part of something amazing, something that doesnt happen everyday.  i will remember this for the rest of my life, even though it will be determined to be a weather balloon or a natural weather phenomena.
content.summary: Three bright points of light traveling erratically above lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 ufo,s the middle one seemed larger or closer to my eyesight,it was exactly like your pic #12 in texas 2007.I saw them several times hovering for while then they moved slowly at first then seemed to disappear!I have a website with ufo on it (i am a firm believer and this is not the first time either in my life)i studied paranormal events for 30 yrs. especially ufo's and my latest finding is that a discovery of a device in a ufo from area 51 has a map of the universe and a device which creates its own wormhole enables the craft to seem to disappear and warp time and space traveling faster than the speed of light to cover enormous short-cut distances in space.I might even be an abductee cause i was having missing time events!
content.summary: Disc,metallic,reflecting the sun light

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were returning from an evening walk under a clear, moonlit sky.  as we neared our home, we noticed a bright light in the western sky.  it was far too large to be a planet.  the light remained stationary with rays of red and gold radiating from its golden corona.  we studied it for several moments.  when it seemed that the object was not going to move, we raced into the house to retrieve a pair of binoculars, and to notify family members. when we returned outdoors just seconds later, the object had vanished.
content.summary: large bright light emitting rays of red and gold from a gold corona

content.detailedDescription:
The afternoon i saw this object it was a very blue sky witth no clouds. i was out walking my dog at the local heritage park in greenfield, holywell n. wales when i looked up at the sky and saw this object which was cigar shaped and bright green, there was nothing else in the sky not even a cloud which made it stand out more. i watched it for nearly 5 minutes, then i must have blinked at one time and it was gone. i remember thinking there was no sound coming from this object and that it seemed motionless. this makes a total of 4 ufo i have seen.

1. in 1975 this was what i would describe as a saucer shape

2. in 1978 this was a ball of light that in the beggining looked begger than the setting sun, and moved across the sky doing a figure eight, then darting zig zaggerdly from one side to the other , constantly changeing size as it moved then it shot off so quick nothing i knew could move that fast. i was with 3 other people at the time and we just stood watching it in disbelief of what we were wittnessing.

3. in 2000 this was what i can only describe as an arrow shapped object which seemed to be concaved at the back with what appeared to be flames coming out of the back area that gave it the look of a tail. it was very low in the sky and i could clearly see the shape  and thought it was crashing, then it disapeared behind the houses.

4. in 2006 this is the ufo described above
content.summary: Very bright  green

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving home from my friends house at around 4 in the morning. it started out as just another ride home; we talked, stopped at the drive-thru to get something to eat, and then we were back on our way. we were about 15 minutes from home when i saw it. it took the shape of saturn. it was gold with a faint red ring around it. though it was not huge, it shone brightly. it was that brightness that is what initially caught my eye. at first i thought it was just a bright light coming from one of the houses that resides way up in the hills. but i soon noticed it was moving. we noticed that it flew in all kinds of crazy directions- something an airplane wouldn't do, and of course, it looked nothing like a plane. and if flew so fast. we couldn't keep up with it. we tailed it the whole ride home, until it eventually it flew into the distance. after all that, i was very amazed and overjoyed at what i had just seen. i've alway been a believer in ufo's, and this just confirmed everything i've ever thought.
content.summary: Looked like saturn, gold with a red ring around it, flew very fast and in crazy directions, it was like nothing i've ever seen before.Last night around 4 in the morning. me and my mom both saw it. it was amazing. it kind of looked like saturn. it was gold

content.detailedDescription:
I was commenting on how cloudy the sky was and that it even looked like snow clouds forming overhead, i noticed a large patch of clear blue sky, and as i focussed on to it, i noticed a shiney silver color cigar shaped something, just hovering there. it was quite high up, i would roughly estimate about 15000 feet or so, as i was watching it, it all of a sudden shot off at a very fast rate, and disapeared into the cloud cover, just as this occured, i noticed what looked like a large passenger jet, with faint blue markings, which was escorted by up to 6 military jet fighters flying in a close formation to the larger aircraft, heading from north-east to south-west across the patch of clear sky then they all disapeared into the cloud cover. i kepts an eye open for the cigar shaped object, but it never returned and the clear patch soon filled up with grey cloud cover! the large jet looked alot like it could have been airforce one!
but i could not make any positive identification.
content.summary: Strange sighted event over denver
